comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 13, 2022, 04:31:44 PMwhen is there a new one?We actually posted another $15 BTC giveaway in our official subreddit just 2 days ago! The entries have closed for that one but we plan on doing many, many more. Here's a direct link to our subreddit, make sure to join! https://www.reddit.com/r/puntdotcomIn case you are interested in daily Bonus Drops, here is the link to the official Punt.com telegram group as well: https://t.me/+Xz9DBdUm2CY2ZTFh
